articles.description: Liverpool injuries and round-up of estimated return dates for players including Thiago Alcantara, Jordan Henderson, Naby Keita ahead of Brighton in the Premier League.
articles.content:
Liverpool face Brighton on Saturday as their injury crisis continues.
The bad luck this season continued during the game with Leicester City on Sunday after Naby Keita hobbled off injured in the sec… [+5534 chars]

articles.author: Kieran Jackson
articles.title: Dries Mertens says it was 'tough to pull that shirt on' after Napoli players wore 'Maradona 10' top - Daily Mail
articles.description: On Thursday, outside the stadium which is set to be renamed the Stadio Diego Armando Maradona, thousands of fans laid flowers - and Mertens was very emotional when speaking afterwards.
articles.content:
Napoli star Dries Mertens conceded it was 'tough to pull on' the Maradona 10 shirt which the entire side wore before their Europa League win against Rijeka on Thursday night. 
Footballing great Mara… [+2849 chars]

articles.author: Dan Ripley
articles.title: Juventus 'are lining up Manchester United's Donny van de Beek for a summer move' - Daily Mail
articles.description: According to CalcioMercato, Juventus think a move in January is unlikely, but next summer they would be keen to arrange a loan move with a £30million option to buy at the end of the deal.
articles.content:
Donny van de Beek's future at Manchester United already looks uncertain, with reports linking him with a summer move to Juventus.
The Dutchman only made the switch to Old Trafford this summer as Uni… [+2784 chars]
